dialogue.text: As the Holy Maiden of Kamihama, I must liberate all magical girls from their fate!
I will not tolerate anyone who protest the Magius' plans. Why do you protest freedom from our fate as magical girls?
I'll eliminate anyone in our way, starting with you.
You're already troublesome to our mission if you dare hinder the truth of magical girls.
Damn it, I cannot let them know... especially Madoka. I need to stop whatever is happening to her.
